message.content: {"id": "32286", "title": "Bug 32286: ControlExample Button Tab - changing styles resets button orientation", "description": "Bug 32286: ControlExample Button Tab - changing styles resets button orientation. Ensure that Eclipse is not running and accept new configuration defaults. The buttons should change to arrow buttons pointing up.", "OB": "The buttons do not change to arrow buttons pointing up.", "EB": "The issue can be reproduced by selecting or deselecting SWT.BORDER in the styles group.", "SR": "The button orientation should not be reset when changing styles, and the buttons should always point up regardless of the style configuration."}
